This pre-owned or refurbished product has been professionally inspected and tested to work and look like new. How a product becomes part of Amazon Renewed, your destination for pre-owned, refurbished products: A customer buys a new product and returns it or trades it in for a newer or different model. That product is inspected and tested to work and look like new by Amazon-qualified suppliers. Then, the product is sold as an Amazon Renewed product on Amazon. If not satisfied with the purchase, renewed products are eligible for replacement or refund under the Amazon Renewed Guarantee.

Product Description

【Perfect processor for performance, power consumption, and value】Easily handle home, work and school tasks with Intel Celeron N4120 processor, quad-core CPU, burst frequency up to 2.60GHz; New OS Windows 11 Pro laptop;Built-in UHD Graphics 600 core graphics card, to ensure faster image processing and provide higher image quality, fluently decode 4K video, you can take online courses or watch your favorite programs.
【Large memory and storage space】 Smooth operation with built-in 8GB LPDDR4 memory；Faster data accessing speed with 128GB solid-state hard drive storage,to meet your daily multitasking and storage needs; If you need more, support the expansion of M.2 SSD to 2TB (please refer to the video below for the expansion tutorial), and support the addition of a 256GB Micro SD card.
【HD 4K viewing experience】 The laptop is equipped with a 14-inch full HD IPS display with a resolution of 1920×1080 and supports 1080P video. You can enjoy the ideal picture with bright, saturated and natural colors at any angle. It is provided Better viewing experience when watching videos and doing daily work; at the same time, it has a 2MP high-definition camera that allows you to easily video chat with friends or complete a video conference elegantly.
【High-speed data transmission&5G Wifi】 Use 5G Wifi with laptop to make your download and upload speed 2 times faster than traditional laptop at least; 1 SuperSpeed USB Type-C 5Gbps signal rate and two SuperSpeed USB 3.0 to enjoy high-speed data transmission , Work efficiently under the smooth network.
【Lightweight,portable and long battery life】The laptop weighs only 2.87 pounds and is as thin as 0.72 inches, which easily take it to anywhere;More than 7 hours battery life allowing you to recreat, study, and work all day,get the to-do list all done.We provide 12 months of warranty and lifetime technical services. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact our customer service.

The quality of Samsung Meets the accessibility of chrome OS. Its all-new light and compact design lets you stream, work, create, and play on a fast, secure device designed to take everywhere. You can download and save content and work with others using Google suite. Built with long-lasting battery and Gigabit Wi-Fi connectivity, The new Samsung Chromebook 4 brings speed and efficiency to any and every task or adventure.
Compact, light design with 11. 6” display
Military-grade durability
Ultra-fast connectivity with Gigabit Wi-Fi
Advanced security with multiple layers of built-in virus protection
12. 5 hours of battery life
Google Assistant enabled

Samsung Chromebook 4 11.6″

The quality of Samsung meets the accessibility of Chrome OS. Its all-new light and compact design lets you stream, work, create, and play on a fast, secure device designed to take everywhere. You can download and save content and work with others using Google Suite. Built with long-lasting battery and Gigabit Wi-Fi connectivity, the new Samsung Chromebook 4 brings speed and efficiency to any and every task or adventure.

Specifications

  • Operating System: Chrome OS
  • Processor: Intel Celeron Processor N4000
  • System Memory: 4GB LPDDR4/4GB x 1, Max 4GB
  • Storage: 32GB eMMC
  • Display: 11.6″ HD LED (1366 x 768)

Read more

Product Features

Just your size

Slim, under 3 pounds, and with military-grade durability*, it’s made to handle bumps and drops. Plus, it comes with a full-sized keyboard and trackpad.

Google makes it easy.

Access the world of Google. Use Google Docs, Google Drive, the Google Play Store and more.

Ultra-fast connectivity

With a lightning fast Gigabit Wi-Fi connection, stream or download massive files rapidly.

Read more

Protected inside and out

Multiple layers of built-in virus protection guard against malicious malware. Automatic updates ensure you always have the latest in security protection.

Power through your day.

Delivers up to 12 hours** of battery on a full charge that quickly recharges on a USB-C charger.

Just say the word.

Use your voice to make a request and Google Assistant will get it done—whether you want to update your calendar or reply to a message, make a note or check the news.

Read more

*Meets eight military-grade (MIL-STD-810G) standards including: transit drop, vibration, high temperature, temperature shocks, freezing, dust, humidity, low pressure.

**A Measured according to Google Scenario (Power Load Test) criteria. (Tested Product Specifications: Intel Celeron Processor N4000 / 4GB Memory / 32GB eMMC). Battery life may vary depending on network environment, usage patterns and other factors.

4.5

Product Description

8GB RAM 256GB SSD

8GB LPDDR4X memory, 256GB SSD high-speed storage lets you use very smoothly in daily work. What’s more, GemiBook supports Sata protocal 2280 SSD expansion to 1TB, realizing massive space.

2K Resolution IPS Screen

13in 2K resolution IPS screen, both text and pictures are clear, 3:2 The aspect ratio of the screen, can expand the vertical space of the screen, and can display more content.

it has a comfortable visual experience and higher efficiency.

Backlit Keyboard & Narrow Bezel

Chuwi GemiBook windows laptop houses a narrow-bezel 13”FHD IPS , Features a backlit keyboard which makes you work comfortably in dark environment.

Ultra-light and Ultra-thin

The body of this traditional Laptop computers is made of light alloy and weighs only 2.95 pounds. Sharing and callaborating is even easier with 180° hinge and 170° wide viewing angle.

High Speed Wireless Connection

CHUWI GemiBook laptop computer Intel Wireless-AC 7265 Wireless module supports 2.4G /5G dual-bandandthe top speed can reach 867Mbps, providing a more smooth Wireless network experience.

this windows 10 laptop adopts 38Wh high-capacity lithiumion battery, battery life up to 8 hours, which is enough for a whole day’s use. support upgrade to Windows 11 Home .

【High Performance Processor】- CHUWI GemiBook windows laptop powered by Intel Celeron J4125 processor, frequency up to 2.7GHz, 4 cores 4 threads, powerful operation without lagging make your device runs smoothly for daliy work and entertainment, preferred for business office or student. support upgrade to windows 11.
【13in 2K resolution IPS Display 】- GemiBook 13 inch laptop computer with 2K resolution FHD IPS screen, both text and pictures are clear. 3:2 The aspect ratio can expand the vertical space of the screen which can display more content, bring you a comfortable visual experience and higher efficiency when browsing web pages or documents.
【Large Capacity Storage】- This Win 10 Laptop with 8GB RAM(LPDDR4X), 256GB high-speed SSD, let you use smoothly without stuck even with multiple programs opened. supports NVMe 2280 SSD expansion to 1TB and TF card expansion to 512GB, realizing massive space for most complex software run efficient.
【Premium Portable Design】- This traditional Laptop computer made of magnesium-alloy weighs only 2.82 pounds, has excellent portability. Adopts 180°hinge makes sharing and ollaborating much easier. Equipped with a full size backlit keyboard and large trackpad, which provide a more convenient typing experience and ensuring visibility even in the dark.
【Longer Battery Life】- GemiBook home laptop pc adopts 38Wh lithium-ion battery which life up to 8H enough for daliy use. Equipped with full function USB-C, supports video or data transmission and PD2.0 fast charging. In addition, there are many interfaces such as USB-A 3.0*1，3.5mm headphone jack, M.2 SSD extension, Micro-SD, etc.
